desc: An in-depth look at the internals of the WordPress system. As the most popular blogging and content management platform available today, WordPress is a powerful tool. This exciting book goes beyond the basics and delves into the heart of the WordPress system, offering overviews of the functional aspects of WordPress as well as plug-in and theme development.

details.authors: Hal Stern, David Damstra, Brad Williams

title: Professional WordPress: Design and Development
